title: Ranked 5s team looking for support+jungler.
body:
Hello, me and 2 friends are looking for a casual but active jungler and support to fill our ranked team. We would like to play most days from 5pm~. Rank is not a issue as its a casual team just looking to climb the ladder and stay together win or lose. 
Add me in game or leave an application here and ill message you back.

Top: Spiritz (Silver 3)
Jungle:
Mid: WWE (Silver 5)
ADC: Tyron (Platinum 3)
Support:

replies.body:
Support main, Im unranked but really good ;D hahah plus fun to play with sooo add me ig: rezendebae
 I mostly play {{champion:201}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:267}}
Support main, add me in game if a spot is still available

Hi,

I am silver 5 support. Looking to join a casual team.

hey yeah i can support you 
Silver 3
IGN: Posso The Pimp
Careful, you might just suddenly get kicked with no message at all. These guys are really good with communication.
